CustomField.formula: IF( TeamGoals__c > OpponentGoals__c , IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0685J00000172L8&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5J000003OZFz", "win"), IF( TeamGoals__c < OpponentGoals__c, IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0685J00000172L4&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5J000003OZFp", "lose"), IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Png&versionId=0685J00000172L3&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5J000003OZFk", "draw") ))
CustomField.label: Result
